description: Manjirou`s father. His naive and clumsy personality plagued him during his his career. Now he is retired and is focusing on his internal job. He dies in episode 9, officially drowning while being drunk. Tezuka Ryousen, who was drinking with him that night, later reveals to Ibuya Manjirou that he was assassinated by Kusunoki Otojirou.
name: Ibuya Senzaburou
